query:
SELECT DISTINCT t.id, t.codigo, t.instituicao, 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM eventos e WHERE e.turmaId = t.id AND e.dataEvento IS NOT NULL) as eventos_com_data,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM formandos f WHERE f.turmaId = t.id) as total_formandos
FROM turmas t 
WHERE (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM eventos e WHERE e.turmaId = t.id AND e.dataEvento IS NOT NULL) > 0
  AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM formandos f WHERE f.turmaId = t.id) > 0
LIMIT 10;

  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM eventos e WHERE e.turmaId = t.id AND e.dataEvento IS NOT NULL) as eventos_com_data,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM formandos f WHERE f.turmaId = t.id) as total_formandos
FROM turmas t 
WHERE (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM eventos e WHERE e.turmaId = t.id AND e.dataEvento IS NOT NULL) > 0
  AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM formandos f WHERE f.turmaId = t.id) > 0
LIMIT 10;
